SELECT COALESCE(SUM(P.PRICE * S.QTY), 0) FROM SALES S JOIN PRODUCT P ON S.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(S.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
